QuestData.Title: To Old Friends
QuestData.Description: I sense a powerful dark presence here, $n, but it is not of Xavius. This feels too familiar.$B$BI sense a druid's touch here, a druid twisted by the shadow of the Nightmare.$B$BWe must deal with this threat if we are to find Xavius. I will take to the skies and lend you my aid.$B$BFind this corrupted druid and cut down his tainted and twisted plants.
QuestData.RewardText: Know this, $n. You did the only thing you could.$b$bWhen a mortal has become corrupted by the nightmare, there is no return. Only death will set them free.
